de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans

Class AbstractKMeans.Instance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.AbstractKMeans.Instance
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KMeansCompare.Instance, KMeansHamerly.Instance, KMeansLloyd.Instance, KMeansMacQueen.Instance, KMeansMinusMinus.Instance, KMeansSimplifiedElkan.Instance, KMediansLloyd.Instance, SingleAssignmentKMeans.Instance
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractKMeans<V extends NumberVector,M extends Model>

    protected abstract static class AbstractKMeans.Instance
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner instance for a run, for better encapsulation, that encapsulates the standard flow of most (but not all) k-means variations.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • recomputeSeperation

        protected void recomputeSeperation(double[] sep,
                                   double[][] cdist)
        Recompute the separation of cluster means.

        Used by Elkan's variant and Exponion.

        Parameters:
        sep - Output array of separation
        cdist - Center-to-Center distances (half-sqrt scaled)

      • movedDistance

        protected double movedDistance(double[][] means,
                               double[][] newmeans,
                               double[] dists)
        Maximum distance moved.

        Used by Hamerly, Elkan (not using the maximum).

        Parameters:
        means - Old means
        newmeans - New means
        dists - Distances moved (output)
        Returns:
        Maximum distance moved
